component.name: getSubUser
component.description: Check to see if you are subscribed to the user with the given id

component.name: getSubThread
component.description: Check to see if you are subscribed to thread with the given id

component.name: getSubTopic
component.description: Check to see if you are subscribed to topic with the given id

component.name: addSubscription
component.description: Subscribe to a user or topic

component.name: deleteSubscription
component.description: Unsubscribe to a user or topic
